hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #an Ocarina#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Lower Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Hover Boots# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #an Ocarina#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
